content: That sounds like a great idea! I think it would be really beneficial for our class to get out into the field and practice our skills in a beautiful setting. Since we're just starting out, it might be helpful to focus on some specific projects or assignments to help us stay on track and make the most of our time. What do you think about assigning some specific themes or challenges for us to work on during the trip? For example, we could focus on capturing a certain type of landscape, like mountains or waterfalls, or try to get some portraits of each other in a natural setting. Do you have any other ideas for projects or themes that would be suitable for a class trip like this?
